00147             function                process_report_template_list( $Str , $Changed )
00148             {
00149                   try
00150                   {
00151                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_template_list' ) ; )
00152                         {
00153                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00154                               
00155                               /* \~english getting macro parameters */
00156                               $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00157                               $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00158                               $Subfolder = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'subfolder' , '' );
00159                               $ReportsPath = _get_package_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )."/res/reports/";
00160                               if( $Subfolder != '' )
00161                               {
00162                                     $ReportsPath .= $Subfolder.'/';
00163                               }
00164                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 
00165                                     'name' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'report_template' )
00166                               );
00167                               
00168                               /* \~english getting list of reports */
00169                               $Reports = $this->Utilities->get_files_from_directory( $ReportsPath , '/\.rep/' );
00170 
00171                               $Ids = array();
00172                               $Titles = array();
00173                               
00174                               foreach( $Reports as $i => $r )
00175                               {
00176                                     $Ids [] = $i;
00177                                     $Titles [] = basename( $r , '.rep' );
00178                               }
00179                               
00180                               if( $Subfolder != '' )
00181                               {
00182                                     $Subfolder = '<input type="hidden" name="subfolder" value="'.$Subfolder.'">';
00183                               }
00184                               
00185                               $Str = str_replace( 
00186                                     "{report_template_list:$Params}" , 
00187                                     "$Subfolder{select:class=width_320 flat;".$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().';first='.
00188                                           implode( '|' , $Ids ).';second='.implode( '|' , $Titles ).'}' , 
00189                                     $Str
00190                               );
00191                               $Changed = true;
00192                         }
00193                         
00194                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00195                   }
00196                   catch( Exception $e )
00197                   {
00198                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00199                   }
00200             }

00228             function                process_report_template( $Str , $Changed )
00229             {
00230                   try
00231                   {
00232                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_template' ) ; )
00233                         {
00234                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00235                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00236                               
00237                               $BlockData = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , "report_template:$Params" , '~report_template' );
00238                               $this->Templates [ $Name ] = $BlockData;
00239                               
00240                               $Str =  $this->String->hide_block( 
00241                                     $Str , "report_template:$Params" , '~report_template' , $Changed
00242                               );
00243                               
00244                               $Changed = true;
00245                         }
00246                         
00247                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00248                   }
00249                   catch( Exception $e )
00250                   {
00251                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00281             function                process_report_query( $Str , $Changed )
00282             {
00283                   try
00284                   {
00285                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_query' , array( 'query' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00286                         {
00287                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00288                               
00289                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , false );
00290                               
00291                               $Query = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' , false );
00292                               
00293                               if( $Query )
00294                               {
00295                                     $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00296                                     $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
00297                                     $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
00298                               }
00299                               else
00300                               {
00301                                     $AccessPackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_name' );
00302                                     $AccessPackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
00303                                     
00304                                     $Provider = get_package( $AccessPackageName , $AccessPackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00305                                     
00306                                     $AccessFunctionName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'func_name' );
00307                                     
00308                                     $Records = call_user_func( array( $Provider , $AccessFunctionName ) , $this->BlockSettings );
00309                               }
00310                               
00311                               if( $Name === false )
00312                               {
00313                                     $TemplatePackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template_package_name' );
00314                                     $TemplatePackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template_package_version' , 'last' );
00315                                     $TemplateName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template' );
00316                                     
00317                                     $Path = _get_package_path_ex( $TemplatePackageName , $TemplatePackageVersion )."/res/templates/$TemplateName";
00318                                     $RawTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Path );
00319                               }
00320                               else
00321                               {
00322                                     $RawTemplate = $this->Templates[ $Name ];
00323                               }
00324                               
00325                               $FormattedRecords = '';
00326                               
00327                               foreach( $Records as $k => $r )
00328                               {
00329                                     $Template = $RawTemplate;
00330                                     $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $r );
00331                                     $Template = str_replace( '{rowid}' , $k + 1 , $Template );
00332                                     $Template = str_replace( '{recid}' , $k , $Template );
00333                                     if( $k % 2 )
00334                                     {
00335                                           $Template = str_replace( '{odd_factor}' , 'odd' , $Template );
00336                                     }
00337                                     else
00338                                     {
00339                                           $Template = str_replace( '{odd_factor}' , 'even' , $Template );
00340                                     }
00341                                     $FormattedRecords .= $Template;
00342                               }
00343                               
00344                               $Str = str_replace( "{report_query:$Params}" , $FormattedRecords , $Str );
00345                               $Changed = true;
00346                         }
00347                         
00348                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00349                   }
00350                   catch( Exception $e )
00351                   {
00352                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00353                   }
00354             }

00382             function                process_report_button( $Str , $Changed )
00383             {
00384                   try
00385                   {
00386                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_button' ) ; )
00387                         {
00388                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00389                               
00390                               $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
00391                               $Code = "<a id=\"report_opener_$id\" href=\"javascript:void(0);\">{title}</a><div id=\"$id\">".
00392                                           "<span class=\"package_name\">{package_name}</span>".
00393                                           "<span class=\"package_version\">{package_version}</span>".
00394                                           "<span class=\"report_name\">{report_name}</span>".
00395                                           '{static_content:package_name={package_name};package_version={package_version};'.
00396                                           "template={template}}</div>{dialog:selector=#$id;opener=#report_opener_$id;".
00397                                           "ok_processor=ultimix.report.OnRunReportGeneration}";
00398                               
00399                               $Code = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' ) , $Code );
00400                               $Code = str_replace( 
00401                                     '{package_name}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , $Code
00402                               );
00403                               $Code = str_replace( 
00404                                     '{package_version}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' ) , $Code
00405                               );
00406                               $Code = str_replace( '{template}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template' ) , $Code );
00407                               
00408                               $Str = str_replace( "{report_button:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
00409                               $Changed = true;
00410                         }
00411                         
00412                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00413                   }
00414                   catch( Exception $e )
00415                   {
00416                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00417                   }
00418             }

00500             function                get_report_template( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $ReportTemplate , $Subfolder )
00501             {
00502                   try
00503                   {
00504                         $ReportsPath = _get_package_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )."/res/reports/";
00505                         
00506                         if( $Subfolder != '' )
00507                         {
00508                               $ReportsPath .= $Subfolder.'/';
00509                         }
00510                         
00511                         /* \~english getting list of reports */
00512                         $Reports = $this->Utilities->get_files_from_directory( $ReportsPath , '/\.rep/' );
00513                         $Report = $Reports[ $ReportTemplate ];
00514                         return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Report ) );
00515                   }
00516                   catch( Exception $e )
00517                   {
00518                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00519                   }

00540             function                generate_report( $Options )
00541             {
00542                   try
00543                   {
00544                         $ReportPackageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_name' , 'string' , false );
00545                         $ReportPackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'report_package_name' , $ReportPackageName );
00546                         
00547                         $ReportPackageVersion = $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_version' , 'string' , 'last' );
00548                         $ReportPackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'report_package_version' , $ReportPackageVersion );
00549                         
00550                         $FunctionName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'function_name' , 'string' , 'report' );
00551                         $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'function_name' , $FunctionName );
00552                         
00553                         $Extension = $this->Security->get_gp( 'output' , 'string' , 'txt' );
00554                         $Extension = $Options->get_setting( 'output' , $Extension );
00555                         
00556                         $Package = get_package( $ReportPackageName , $ReportPackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00557                         
00558                         if( method_exists( $Package , $FunctionName ) )
00559                         {
00560                               call_user_func( array( $Package , $FunctionName ) , $Options );
00561                               
00562                               if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_template' , 'integer' , false ) !== false )
00563                               {
00564                                     /* it means that the function 'report' has returned data, not the generated report */
00565                                     $ReportTemplate = $this->get_report_template( $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_name' , 'string' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_version' , 'string' , 'last' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_template' , 'integer' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'subfolder' , 'command' , '' ) );
00566                                     $Package->Output = $this->String->print_record( $ReportTemplate , $Package->Output );
00567                               }
00568                               
00569                               header( 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' );
00570                               header( 'Content-type: application/octet-stream' );
00571                               header( 'Content-Length: '.strlen( $Package->Output ) );
00572                               header( 'Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.date( 'YmdHid' ).".$Extension".'"' );
00573                               header( 'Connection: close' );
00574                               
00575                               $this->Output = $Package->Output;
00576                         }
00577                         else
00578                         {
00579                               throw( new Exception( "Method \"$FunctionName\" does not exists in the package \"$ReportPackageName.$ReportPackageVersion\"" ) );
00580                         }
00581                   }
00582                   catch( Exception $e )
00583                   {
00584                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00585                   }
00586             }
00587
